Onz

Prepared:

Onz43

A tailored growth strategy for Onz

Executive Summary

Executive Summary

Onz, you have a wealth of potential in your existing B2B contact data. However, outdated or inaccurate information can severely limit your outreach efforts, waste valuable sales time, and ultimately, hinder your revenue growth. Dirty data leads to wasted resources, damaged reputation, and missed opportunities.

Expandia offers a streamlined solution: comprehensive B2B contact data cleaning and enrichment. We'll meticulously verify both contacts and companies, remove expired and invalid entries, and enrich the remaining data with relevant details. We're offering a dedicated "Onz43" project.

Our process focuses on:

  • Contact Verification
  • Company Verification
  • Data Enrichment
  • Data Quality Enhancement

The value is clear: For just $1 per contact cleaned and enriched, you'll gain access to a database of accurate, up-to-date, and enriched contact information. This directly translates to:

  • Increased Efficiency: Sales reps spend less time on bad leads.
  • Improved Conversion Rates: Higher quality data leads to more successful outreach.
  • Maximized ROI: Your marketing and sales efforts become more effective, generating a substantial return on your investment.

We're confident that clean data is the foundation of effective B2B sales and marketing. We are offering you a complete enrichment and cleansing for your existing data base.

Our Services & Packages

Our Services & Packages for Onz

Master Data Cleansing & Enrichment - Core

Ensure your B2B contact data is accurate, up-to-date, and ready to drive results. We'll clean, verify, and enrich your existing master data.

  • Verification of both contacts and companies
  • Removal of expired or invalid contacts
  • Data enrichment where applicable (job titles, etc.)
  • Guaranteed high data quality

$1 / contact

Timeline & Phases

Timeline

Phase 1: Data Audit & Planning

We'll begin with a thorough audit of your contact data to understand its current state, including volume, age, and existing quality. This phase informs the subsequent data cleansing and enrichment strategy.

  • Initial data assessment and sample analysis.
  • Define specific cleansing and enrichment criteria based on your needs.
  • Set up quality control measures.

Phase 2: Data Cleansing & Verification

This phase focuses on the core data cleansing process. We'll verify existing contacts, remove outdated entries, and begin the process of cleaning and verifying your b2b contact list.

  • Verification of contact details (email, phone, etc.).
  • Removal of invalid or outdated contacts.
  • Company verification and data integrity checks.

Phase 3: Data Enrichment & Delivery

We will enrich your data with missing information where applicable, such as job titles, company industry, and more. This enriches data and gets it ready for delivery.

  • Data enrichment based on pre-defined criteria.
  • Final quality assurance checks.
  • Data delivery in your preferred format (e.g., CSV, Excel).

Expected Results & Metrics

Value Metrics & ROI

Our primary goal is to significantly improve the quality and usability of your B2B contact data. We focus on delivering a verifiable ROI by increasing the efficiency of your sales and marketing efforts.

Key Performance Indicators

  • Contacts Cleaned & Verified: Minimum 5,000 contacts within the first month.
  • Data Enrichment: Average of 10% of records enriched with missing data (e.g., job title, direct dial).
  • Expired Contacts Removal: Minimum 10% of the database cleaned from invalid/expired contacts.
  • Data Accuracy Improvement: Achieve a minimum 95% accuracy rate for verified contacts.

ROI Calculation

Let's assume the following, based on an initial data set of 10,000 contacts and current industry averages:

  • Cost per Contact: $1.00
  • Total Project Cost: (Calculated based on contacts processed)
  • Initial Data Set: 10,000 contacts.
  • Improvement in sales efficiency: 15% improvement in conversion rate from leads to opportunities.
  • Average deal size: $10,000

By improving the accuracy and quality of your data, you can significantly increase the effectiveness of your sales and marketing efforts. A better quality of data leads to a higher conversion rate for your sales team.

Quantifiable Value

**Value of new oppotunities** (based on a 15% increase in conversion rate) : Number of contacts * new contacts * average conversion rate* value of new opportunities.

**Total Value:** (Calculation based on the number of contacts, data quality and enriched data to be agreed with the client upon project initiation, in relation with their current sales process)

Terms & Conditions

Terms & Conditions

Payment Terms

This project is structured on a project-based pricing model. Payment terms are as follows:

  • 50% upfront payment upon signing the agreement.
  • 50% payment upon completion and delivery of the cleaned and enriched contact data.

Pricing

The project is priced at $1 per contact. The total cost will depend on the number of contacts in your master data.

Service Level Agreement (SLA)

Expandia is committed to providing high-quality data cleaning and enrichment services. Our SLA includes:

  • Data Verification: Verification of both contact and company information for accuracy.
  • Data Removal: Removal of expired or invalid contact data.
  • Data Enrichment: Enrichment of contact data with relevant information where applicable.
  • Data Quality Guarantee: Ensuring a high standard of data quality.
  • Data Delivery: Delivery of the cleaned and enriched data within the agreed-upon timeframe.

Project Scope & Deliverables

The scope of this project includes the cleaning and enrichment of your provided master B2B contact data. Deliverables will include:

  • A cleaned and enriched contact data file in the agreed-upon format (e.g., CSV, Excel).
  • A report summarizing the data cleaning and enrichment process, including the number of contacts processed, removed, and enriched.
  • A consultation regarding the best way to integrate the updated data into your CRM.

Client Responsibilities

To ensure the successful completion of this project, we request the following from Onz:

  • Provide the master data in a readily accessible format.
  • Specify any specific data fields or enrichment requirements.
  • Promptly respond to any queries or requests for clarification during the project.
  • Approve the final data set before integration.

Confidentiality

Expandia will treat all client data with the utmost confidentiality. We will not share your data with any third parties and will adhere to all relevant data privacy regulations.

Contact

If you have any questions or require clarification, please contact us.
